name: KLPlayer
0:
”Alexa, ask k. l. player to play k.l. 1 radio”
”Alexa, ask k. l. player to play the news”
”Alexa ask k. l. player to play the weather”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. l. player
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Play all your favourite KL1 Radio streams with on demand News and Weather 24/7
Ask K L Player to play The News, The Weather or ask K L Player to play KL1 or other music streams such as KL Country and KL Chill.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
